channel.title: Total n00b here
channel.description:
Yeah i just fund out about this place but I have absolutely no idea what to do. I downloaded this thing from another site that called whitescape sometimes ans moparscape sometimes but it doesn't let me open doors ard there are no monsters. Then I downloaded a different one from here but I don't know what IP to log in to or what username or password to put.
Edit: I would also likw to know what SCAR scripts are.

item.title: Total n00b here
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

CToaN:

The only java I know is how to make those warning boxes pop up. I learned that by viewing the source of the most annoying webpage. Where can I get SCAR? I googled it but most of the pages it leads to are gone.

get SCAR at www.dylock.net/scar/

Read full topic

item.title: Total n00b here
item.dc:creator: @AARisAIR AARisAIR
item.description:
@AARisAIR wrote:

And ill try to help with your first question, Whitescape is the Runescape Private Server Moparscape is the client that lets you connect to it. There are many guides on here that will help you create a private server and make it pretty good. I recommend trying HybridScape if you are going to do it but as a warning if you dont know ANY java, I would just play on someone elses' server.

Read full topic

item.title: Total n00b here
item.dc:creator: @KyleGut3 KyleGut3
item.description:
@KyleGut3 wrote:

well i can tell you the second one

SCAR is a program that more or less moves your mouse, types for you, etc. a SCAR script is basically a program that tells your computer to move your mouse here, click, type this, etc. These are used primarily to cheat on games such as RS.

Read full topic
